PC Number Date Chapter Bill Dept
 2021-03032021-04-19,  ,  ,  ,  JUS, 
ActContraventions Act
SubjectRegulations Amending the Contraventions Regulations
PrecisRegulations amending the CONTRAVENTIONS REGULATIONS in order to expand the list of offences which could be prosecuted by means of a contraventions ticket for both the commercial and recreational sectors by designating as contraventions one offence contained in the Fisheries Act and offences contained in the Fishery (General) Regulations, the Atlantic Fishery Regulations, 1985, the Pacific Fishery Regulations, 1993, the Newfoundland and Labrador Fishery Regulations, and the British Columbia Sport Fishing Regulations, 1996.
RegistrationRegistration: SOR/ 2021-0081 Publication Date: 2021-04-28
AttachmentsAttachment
